text: “Maaŋ muuŋgip guma the nde suaŋv suan saŋv muunga, nde mba guma, nde wari tɨgɨp bigi ndi thɨgar mbai ŋanen ŋgɨp, nde vhemkora ana phorgɨp suaŋv, ŋko mba tuav sɨgera mba bigeŋ ndi thɨgar mbarari. Ndu muuŋv kɨrga, mba guma ndu ndim, bigi ndi thɨgar mbai guman pana farve khɨngirga. Mba bigi ndi thɨgar mbai guma ana ndu ndim gɨɨtɨvi farve khɨngirim, mbe ndu ndi phena tɨvaneŋ khɨngirga.
